page.title: 17Clubs
page.content: Both North and South Queensferry cater for young people.The clubs include Brownies and Guides,Cubs and Scouts, Boys and girls Brigade,playgroups and youth clubs.A new unit for Venture Scouts(catering for 16_20 year olds) is being formed this year in South Queensferry.Adults are also well looked after.There are Pensioners Clubs,Masonic Lodge and Bowling Club. These clubs meet throughout the year. Both North and South Queensferry hold Galas and committees meet to make and follow through plans for these occasions.
